information.description: Know more than just the current time!

changelog.changes:
- Added support for updating the status bar time every second if specified in the format. 
- Added options to set view center (Vertical Alignment)

- Seconds timer will be suspended when device is locked to preserve battery. 
- Preferences are now pretty much updated live! No respring required in most cases
Look at screen state(ON/OFF) instead of lock state to suspend seconds timer
